languages.text: "На самом деле все это далось тебе тяжелее, чем ты показываешь, верно?"
"All this has taken more of a toll than you've let on, hasn't it?"
languages.original_text: "На самом деле все это далось тебе тяжелее, чем ты показываешь, верно?"

traits.locale_text: "All this has taken more of a toll than you've let on, hasn't it?"
"All this has taken more of a toll than you've let on, hasn't it?"
"All this has taken more of a toll than you've let on, hasn't it?"
"All this has taken more of a toll than you've let on, hasn't it?"
"All this has taken more of a toll than you've let on, hasn't it?"

languages.text: « Cette histoire vous a marqué, je me trompe ? Plus que vous ne le laissez paraître. »
languages.original_text: "All this has taken more of a toll than you've let on, hasn't it?"

traits.locale_text: « Cette histoire vous a marqué, je me trompe ? Plus que vous ne le laissez paraître. »

languages.text: 「君が口にしている以上に、今回のことは堪えているんじゃないか？」
languages.original_text: "All this has taken more of a toll than you've let on, hasn't it?"

traits.locale_text: 「君が口にしている以上に、今回のことは堪えているんじゃないか？」

languages.text: «Todo esto le está pasando más factura de lo que deja ver, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: "All this has taken more of a toll than you've let on, hasn't it?"

traits.locale_text: «Todo esto le está pasando más factura de lo que deja ver, ¿verdad?».

languages.text: “这一切对你造成的影响，实际上比看起来更严重，没错吧？”
languages.original_text: "All this has taken more of a toll than you've let on, hasn't it?"

traits.locale_text: “这一切对你造成的影响，实际上比看起来更严重，没错吧？”

languages.original_text: "All this has taken more of a toll than you've let on, hasn't it?"

languages.text: "Die Sache hat Euch stärker zugesetzt, als Ihr zugebt, oder?"
languages.original_text: "All this has taken more of a toll than you've let on, hasn't it?"

traits.locale_text: "Die Sache hat Euch stärker zugesetzt, als Ihr zugebt, oder?"
